description.lang: The AN188 is a miniature size on/off and metering plug to control lighting and appliances. It is possible to turn on/off home devices and check the status directly from a smartphone.Compact in design, yet certified for safety by makes it suitable for plugging into any power outlet. The metering plug can support wattage, voltage, ampere, and measurement. The unit can also detect overload upon which the unit will switch off relay and keep LED flashing until power is off and re-applied.
Basic Set Command value can be set 0~99, 255

name.lang: Set the delaying time to report to Group 1

description.lang: Value of the delaying time to report to Group 1 can be set 3~25 seconds
Delaying time to report to Group 1

name.lang: Set whether to remember the last status

description.lang: remember or not remember the last status

name.lang: Set the interval for wattage auto report

description.lang: Value of the interval for wattage auto report can be set 1~32767 minutes.
The interval for wattage auto report

name.lang: Set the interval for kW*h auto report

description.lang: Value of the interval for kW*h auto report can be set 1~32676 minutes.
The interval for kW*h auto report

name.lang: Auto report when load surpasses the set value of wattage
Auto report when the change of wattage surpasses the set percentage
